attributes.action: Stop helping people who don't bother to pay for their own insurance while not helping those who do.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The tornado in London damaged many homes.

The people affected who paid for home insurance have to use that insurance to facilitate repair to their properties.

The people who did not pay for home insurance are getting the cost of repairs paid for them.

How unfair is that?? It gives out completely the wrong message, that if you don't make these provisions for yourself & your family, someone else will pay for things for you.
